long_description: Stuff these portable Canari Element toe covers in a jersey pocket for toe protection in a pinch. Toe covers easily slide over bike shoes for a layer of warmth in cold weather. Constructed of waterproof, windproof neoprene with easy stretch for a great fit. Bound cleat openings. Overstock.
short_description: Stuff these portable Canari Element toe covers in a jersey pocket for toe protection in a pinch. Toe covers easily slide over bike shoes for a layer of warmth in cold weather.
